(Icedemon, post the damage we've all done to you.  Those three guys of yours, 
Rush and them, have not posted damage at all.  Please do that now)


Ramhorn:


Ramhorn saw the bomb coming.  As he jumped back, he opened fire with 14 sonic 
shells at the bomb, which was only a few feet from where the trio of 
attackers had thrown it from.
